徴: (chou) - indications , fourth degree (da escala pentatônica japonesa e chinesa)
徴す: (しるす) - (印す, 標す only)  to leave (a mark, trace, etc.)/to print/to stamp; to show a sign (i.e. an omen)
徴する: (ちょうする) - to collect; to solicit/to seek; to look for evidence/to check/to compare; to summon
徴候: (ちょうこう) - sign; indication; omen; symptom
徴兵令: (ちょうへいれい) - conscription ordinance/conscription law/draft; Conscription Ordinance (1873-1927)
徴兵免除: (ちょうへいめんじょ) - draft exemption; draught exemption
徴兵制度: (ちょうへいせいど) - conscription; draft system; draught system
徴兵忌避: (ちょうへいきひ) - draft evasion; evading conscription
徴兵忌避者: (ちょうへいきひしゃ) - draft dodger
徴兵検査: (ちょうへいけんさ) - physical examination (given at conscription)
徴兵逃れ: (ちょうへいのがれ) - evading military service; draft dodging
徴古館: (ちょうこかん) - museum (esp. with collections of old objects)
徴用: (ちょうよう) - drafting; requisition; impressment; commandeering; expropriation
徹える: (こたえる) - (応える, 報える only) to respond/to answer/to meet (e.g. demands, expectations); (sometimes 堪える)  to affect/to take a toll/to strike home/to have an effect on/to be hard on someone (e.g. heat, cold, work, illness, etc.)/to be a strain
徹す: (とおす) - to stick through/to force through; to spread throughout/to thoroughly diffuse; to make a path between two points; to proceed in a logical manner; to let pass/to allow through; to lead (someone) into (a house, room, etc.)/to show in; to go through (a middleman); to (look, listen) through (a window, wall, etc.); to pass (a law, applicant, etc.); to force to accept/to force agreement; to continue (in a state)/to persist in; to do to the entirety of/to cover all of/to span the whole ...; (in the form とおして…する) to do from beginning to end without a break; to convey (one's ideas, etc.) to the other party; (after the -te form of a verb) to do to the end/to carry through/to complete
徹する: (てっする) - to penetrate/to sink in; to devote oneself (to)/to do intently and exclusively; to do throughout (e.g. the night)
徹る: (とおる) - to go by/to go past/to go along/to travel along/to pass through/to use (a road)/to take (a route)/to go via/to go by way of; (of public transport) to run (between)/to operate (between)/to connect; to go indoors/to go into a room/to be admitted/to be shown in/to be ushered in/to come in; to penetrate/to pierce/to skewer/to go through/to come through; to permeate/to soak into/to spread throughout; to carry (e.g. of a voice)/to reach far; to be passed on (e.g. of a customer's order to the kitchen)/to be relayed/to be conveyed; to pass (a test, a bill in the House, etc.)/to be approved/to be accepted; to go by (a name)/to be known as/to be accepted as/to have a reputation for; to be coherent/to be logical/to be reasonable/to be comprehensible/to be understandable/to make sense; to get across (e.g. of one's point)/to be understood; to be straight (e.g. wood grain); to be well-informed/to be wise; (after the -masu stem of a verb) to do ... completely/to do ... thoroughly
徹マン: (てつマン) - playing mahjong all night
徹宵: (てっしょう) - all night; without sleep
徹底: (tettei) - minuciosidade, completude, consistência; aplicação rigorosa, garantindo que uma política, etc., seja cumprida sem exceção
徹底抗戦: (てっていこうせん) - do-or-die resistance; resistance to the bitter end
徹底究明: (てっていきゅうめい) - (yoji) thorough investigation; complete inquiry
徹甲弾: (てっこうだん) - armor piercing ammunition; armour piercing ammunition
徹見: (てっけん) - seeing clearly; seeing without obstruction; looking into every nook and corner
徹頭徹尾: (てっとうてつび) - (yoji) thoroughly; through and through
心: (canela/coração) - coração, mente, coração, espírito; o significado de uma frase (enigma, etc.)
心から: (しんから) - from the bottom of one's heart; heart and soul; by nature
心がおどる: (こころがおどる) - to be thrilled; to be excited
心がけ: (こころがけ) - intention; attention; dedication; care; prudence; readiness; mental attitude
心がける: (こころがける) - to keep in mind; to bear in mind; to try; to aim to do; to endeavor; to endeavour
心がこもる: (こころがこもる) - to be thoughtful (of a gift, etc.); to be from the heart; to be made with loving care
心がひかれる: (こころがひかれる) - to feel the call of ...; to have one's heart-strings pulled
心が乱れる: (こころがみだれる) - to lose one's composure
心が動く: (こころがうごく) - to take a fancy to something; to be moved; to feel inclined to
心が和む: (こころがなごむ) - to feel relaxed
心が広い: (こころがひろい) - generous; broad-minded; big-hearted
心が引かれる: (こころがひかれる) - to feel the call of ...; to have one's heart-strings pulled
心が弾む: (こころがはずむ) - to be excited; to be elated
心が清まる: (こころがきよまる) - to feel purified
心が疲れる: (しんがつかれる) - to be mentally fatigued; to tired to the bone
心が籠もる: (こころがこもる) - to be thoughtful (of a gift, etc.); to be from the heart; to be made with loving care
心が躍る: (こころがおどる) - to be thrilled; to be excited
心が通う: (こころがかよう) - to understand each other well; to call forth a response in another's heart; to relate to
心が通じる: (こころがつうじる) - to relate to; to have one's feelings understood
心ここにあらず: (こころここにあらず) - there in body, but not in spirit; distracted; in one ear and out the other
心す: (こころす) - to take care; to mind; to be attentive
心する: (こころする) - to take care; to mind; to be attentive
心づかい: (こころづかい) - solicitude; sympathy; anxiety; regard for; consideration (for others); watchfulness; care
心づく: (こころづく) - to perceive; to notice
心づもり: (こころづもり) - anticipation; expectation; plan; preparation
心ない: (こころない) - thoughtless; inconsiderate; tasteless; cruel
心なし: (こころなし) - lacking in prudence; lacking in judgement
心なしか: (こころなしか) - somehow; somewhat; seemingly
心なし研削: (しんなしけんさく) - centerless grinding; centreless grinding
心ならずも: (こころならずも) - unwillingly; reluctantly; against one's will
心にかなう: (こころにかなう) - to be pleased with; to suit
心にもない: (こころにもない) - (something) one does not really mean; insincere
心にも無い: (こころにもない) - (something) one does not really mean; insincere
心に刻む: (こころにきざむ) - to etch into one's mind; to remember well
心に叶う: (こころにかなう) - to be pleased with; to suit
心に掛かる: (こころにかかる) - to weigh on one's mind; to trouble one
心に描く: (こころにえがく) - to imagine; to envisage
心に染む: (こころにそむ) - to be pleased with; to suit
心に残る: (こころにのこる) - to stay in one's heart; to be enduringly memorable; to be unforgettable
心に浮かぶ: (こころにうかぶ) - to cross one's mind; to spring to mind; to occur to one
心に留める: (こころにとめる) - to bear in mind; to keep remembering
心に秘める: (こころにひめる) - to keep to oneself; to keep secret
心に適なう: (こころにかなう) - to be pleased with; to suit
心のどこかで: (こころのどこかで) - deep down; special place in one's heart; in the back of one's mind
心のぶつかり合い: (こころのぶつかりあい) - clash of minds (between friends); discord; emotional conflict
心のまま: (こころのまま) - to one's heart's content; following one's heart's desires
心の交流: (こころのこうりゅう) - spiritual exchange; reciprocal flow of feeling
心の傷: (こころのきず) - emotional scars; mental trauma
心の儘: (こころのまま) - to one's heart's content; following one's heart's desires
心の優しい人: (こころのやさしいひと) - kind man; kind-hearted man
心の友: (こころのとも) - one's bosom friend; kindred-spirit
心の哲学: (こころのてつがく) - philosophy of mind
